title: Atlantean Syndra skin
body:
I'm not sure if this just happens on my computer, but after 5.22 i've noticed that the spheres of Syndra's atlantean skin are purple, they're not blue anymore. The animation is the same (splashing water with blue particles) even the sound... But they are purple. Can you please fix this? I bought this skin for those water spheres... Please
Thanks

replies.body:
Hiya Michelin Bombin! 

I've loaded up Atlantean Syndra in game, and it appears that the orbs are working properly for me. From enemy view, it's intended that the spheres are purple due to gameplay clarity - could this be what you're experiencing? 

If that's not the case, would you mind attaching a screenshot of what you're seeing? Thanks! ^-^ 

http://imgur.com/0f9pgVb

Thanks, till yesterday their spheres were purple, but i've just played her and now they're blue again. By the way, yeah, i was confused when I saw them purple on an enemy Syndra, and the other was like 'no man, they look blue to me' that was disturbing me, i thought the problem was because of me but now I see not. Thanks a lot for answering so fast :)

I ask it cause I want to buy the new syndra skin, but didn't know if the spheres will look purple again :P
hope not
Spheres for that skin should be a white/blue! I'm working on her right now and we've fixed any instances where purple orbs may have been showing on PBE. :]
